thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Graphic Designer (Seasonal) - Pro Sports

title: Graphic Designer (Seasonal) - Pro Sports
text: Posted/Updated: 10-02-2015 Brief Job Description: Work closely with the creative team to ensure projects are completed within deadline and reflect our brand standards. Use exceptional design skills to create original, innovative concepts...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
